module.name: Misc Applications
module.description: Adds the ability to create feature codes that can go to any FreePBX destination (such as an IVR or queue)
module.changelog: *13.0.3* FREEPBX-14792 List entries option missing under Misc Application module. *13.0.2.4* FREEPBX-12600 Misc Applications cancels user input if feature code already in use *13.0.2.3* FREEPBX-12371 Fix uninstall *13.0.2.2* FREEPBX-11234 *13.0.2.1* Typo fix *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* BMO/Bootstrap *2.11.0.2* Include license file *2.11.0.0* #6055 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.2* #4831 *2.9.0.1* set repository *2.9.0.0* #4651, #4655, #4724
